text: Martha Wainwright (born May 8, 1976) is a Canadian-American folk-rock singer. She is the daughter of singers Loudon Wainwright III and Kate McGarrigle. Her brother Rufus Wainwright is also a well known singer. ==Albums== *Martha Wainwright (2005) *I Know You're Married But I've Got Feelings Too (2008) *Sans Fusils, Ni Souliers, Ã  Paris: Martha Wainwright's Piaf Record (2009) *Come Home to Mama (2012) *Songs in the Dark (2015) == Other websites == * Official website Category:1976 births Category:Living people Category:American singer-songwriters Category:Canadian singers Category:People from Montreal
title: Martha Wainwright
